test.name: http
test.label: HTTP Test
test.description: Verify that the specified HTTP server is functioning properly.
test.longDescription: Phone configuration files produced by the SIPxchange Configuration Server can optionally be served by a HTTP server. This test verifies that the specified HTTP server can be used to retrieve a special phone configuration test file which has been produced by the Configuration Server.

result.msg: The HTTP server address could not be resolved.
result.description: The specified HTTP server address could not be resolved to an IP address. Verify that the DNS server(s) have a valid entry.
The resolved IP address of the specified HTTP server did not respond to ICMP pings. Verify that the server is running and reachable from this network.

result.msg: The HTTP client encountered an unrecoverable error.
result.description: The test client has suffered an unrecoverable network failure. Please see the test log for further information.

result.msg: HTTP GET of test file failed.
result.description: The specified HTTP server failed to serve the test configuration file. Verify that the HTTP server is running and properly configured.

result.msg: HTTP test file did not verify.
result.description: The test file that was retrieved from the specified HTTP server was found to be corrupted. Please contact technical support for further assistance.
